divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to the drive thru down the street from my house when i noticed a minivan in the high school parking lot (east high school)and a man and his children were looking up at the night sky almost straight up.I thought nothing of it that maybe they were just start gazing or something.When i pulled into the holland oil at the bottom of seiberling street i noticed a man standing in the parking lot staring up into the sky as well,so my curiosity got the better of me and i parked my jeep and got out and looked up and saw a round red object that had a circular shape but the cirumfrence was made up of squiggly lines and it was also flickering and pulsating like that of a twinkling star but,this was definately not a star or an airplane or helicopter of that i am certain.We watched it for approximately 4-5 minutes together and then a large cloud rolled overhead and blocked our view of it.I just looked at the guy and said "creeeepy" and he replied "your not lyin".I'm not one to believe in aliens or ufo's but this thing was wierd and it wasn't something that was just burning up in our atmosphere because i've witnessed that happening before so i know what it looks like.In the late 80's i saw a comet or meteor burning up in our atmosphere in the night sky in canton ohio.
Summary: witnessed a circular red object with a squiggly line making up the cirumfrence
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Akron
There were no other sightings in Akron on or around September 24th 2011
